quote: You know,” he said. “I think I would rather be a man than a god. We don’t need anyone to believe in us. We just keep going anyhow. It’s what we do.” There was silence, in the high place.
quote_letters: YOU KNOW HE SAID I THINK I WOULD RATHER BE A MAN THAN A GOD WE DONT NEED ANYONE TO BELIEVE IN US WE JUST KEEP GOING ANYHOW ITS WHAT WE DO THERE WAS SILENCE IN THE HIGH PLACE
